law.text:
Before a local government authorizes or certifies residential property to be rented or leased, the owner of the residential property shall state in writing to the local government under penalty of perjury:
That the residential property is not an affected property; or
That the residential property is an affected property that the landlord has registered as required under § 6-811 of the Environment Article and for which the landlord has renewed the registration as required under § 6-812 of the Environment Article; and
